casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Percy Edward TAYLOR, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 159118
COA: 338601 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 25, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to exceed the page limitation for his reply is GRANTED. The 19-page reply submitted on April 3, 2019, is accepted for filing.
